title: Jameela Jamil reveals that she tried to take her own life six years ago
text:
Jameela Jamil has revealed that she tried to take her life six years ago.

The British actress, 33, made the heartbreaking admission as she took to Twitter to mark World Mental Health Day, going on to admit that she went to use psychotherapy treatment to treat her severe PTSD.

Jameela's tweet read: 'Today is #WorldMentalHealthDay This month, 6 years ago, I tried to take my own life. I’m so lucky that I survived, and went on to use EMDR to treat my severe PTSD.'

'I’m so lucky that I survived': Jameela Jamil, 33, has revealed that she tried to take her life six years ago

Her tweet continued: 'I urge you to hang on just a bit longer and ask for help if you need it. Because things can turn around. I promise.'

Jameela has recently seen considerable backlash after claiming that she wasn't educated in George Bush's presidency.

However, she fired back when a follower accused her of living in privilege: 'I was deaf, abused and physically disabled and broke... with no internet or cable and two parents who didn’t finish their educations or ever discuss politics. The height of privilege...

This comes after Jameela revealed that she had cancer twice as she hit back at a cruel troll on Twitter who said she was 'too old' to dress a certain way.

The striking actress said that having cancer has made her grateful to get older as she slammed the author of the tweet for being 'ageist.'

The comment came after Jameela shared a picture of herself wearing a floral dress, and the troll responded: 'You are too old to dress like that. Not a good look'.

She wrote: 'I would just like to say, that as someone who has been chronically ill my whole life, and had cancer twice, I find it EXTREMELY offensive that there is a cultural taboo around aging.

'Those of us who fight for our lives and those who lost that fight young, deserve more respect.'

The star also suffers from a coeliac disease and severe food allergies and her spine was damaged when she was hit by a car when she was 17.

Jameela, who stars as Tahani Al-Jamil on NBC's hit comedy series, had previously revealed in 2015 that she had suffered a breast cancer scare following the discovery of a lump which later turned not to be cancerous.
description: Jameela Jamil, 33, has revealed that she tried to take her life six years ago.
